channel.title: New Halo ODST trailer
channel.description: This is more a thread trying to solve my confusion. This trailer was just released recently: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I8zdkXtb9Yw[/url] How does this trailer in anyway advertise the game? I just don't see the logic in spending however much it cost to make that when you could have in game footage showing the same thing that actually shows something about the game as well. Feel free to flame me for posting a trailer outside the trailer thread, if you feel it necessary.

item.title: New Halo ODST trailer
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Argh, can’t listen to Microsoft Sam for more than 5 seconds without brain damage. Anyways, I halo wikied it, and, yeah, good job.

Read full topic

item.title: New Halo ODST trailer
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Someonerandm:

What exactly is going on here?

You never heard of Recon armor?
Here’s two videos that eill help you understand what it is:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iyjLnvI4yE0
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BzgXGACAU20

Well, I got it, so I’m awesome.

item.title: New Halo ODST trailer

item.description:
Bungie should market and sell the “Halo Bible” that is so often referenced.

Read full topic

item.title: New Halo ODST trailer
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Someonerandm:

I don’t care if you were walking magical candy land, the level design sucked. If you wish to make the cool fact that you are in a giant computer chip known, make the area interesting not dull and gray. And don’t say it fits into cannon because Halo CE created the freakin’ cannon.

The game was in it’s writing process a while before that. But THAT’S just common sense.

Read full topic

item.title: New Halo ODST trailer
item.dc:creator: Master_Chef
item.description:
Something told me that you spent quite a while away from Earth between Halos 2 & 3, due to the really shitty condition the planet is in in 3, with all the dried up seas, giant molten craters, and dead people.

Read full topic

item.title: New Halo ODST trailer
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
The Flood?

So, I’m confused, the epilogue of ODST says it’s a month after the game…And Johnson is still alive. Does that mean MC is on Halo Dleta for an entire month?

item.title: New Halo ODST trailer
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Master Chef:

Just because they are parasitic creatures in a video game, it doesn’t mean that they are headcrab rip-offs. There were plenty of those before Half-Life.

I know I just couldn’t think of their names and everyone knows what I’m talking about.

Read full topic

item.title: New Halo ODST trailer
item.dc:creator: Master_Chef
item.description:
Someonerandm:

Killing tons of the headcrab rip-offs is fun though.

Just because they are parasitic creatures in a video game, it doesn’t mean that they are headcrab rip-offs. There were plenty of those before Half-Life.

Read full topic

item.title: New Halo ODST trailer
item.dc:creator: Solokiller
item.description:
If you look at the new mombasa city map, you’ll notice it’s really just one half mirrored to create an area that’s twice as large. The ONI alpha site is just as symmetrical, it’s just the objects in the world, locked doors, and shield generators that makes things different.

Read full topic

item.description:
JohnKiller118:

I bet no one would buy it. Because, well, who wants to pay to fight the flood?

Killing tons of the headcrab rip-offs is fun though.

I bet no one would buy it. Because, well, who wants to pay to fight the flood?

item.title: New Halo ODST trailer

item.description:
After playing ODST for a bit, I can say that I don’t like it much either.

I did, however, get a chance to play Batman: Archam Asylum, which was a lot better than I was expecting.

item.title: New Halo ODST trailer

item.description:

It was wave upon wave of Flood.

:fffuuu:

This needs to be made into Firefight.

item.title: New Halo ODST trailer
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
xalener:

I was actually defenting it. Oddly enough.

The thing is, for a majority of that level, you were walking around in an oversized microchip. I’m waiting for some heads to explode from that.

I don’t care if you were walking magical candy land, the level design sucked. If you wish to make the cool fact that you are in a giant computer chip known, make the area interesting not dull and gray. And don’t say it fits into cannon because Halo CE created the freakin’ cannon.

Read full topic
